dialplan.name: Root
dialplan.play: Welcome to the Customer Satisfaction Survey. Please state your name clearly, then press Pound.

menu.name: recommendprogram
menu.play: On a scale of zero to nine, how likely is it that you would recommend our program to a friend or colleague? Zero means not at all, five means neutral, and nine means extremely likely. Please press the appropriate number on your phone's keypad.

dialplan.play: Why did you contact Customer Service today? Record your answer after the beep, then press Pound to continue.

menu.name: answertime
menu.play: How satisfied are you with the time it took customer service to answer your call? Please press One for Satisfied, press Five for Undecided, and press Nine for Dissatisfied.

keypress.play: That is an in valid entry.

dialplan.play: Thank you for participating in our Customer Service Satisfaction Survey. Your answers help us to serve you better!
